project_abstract.cdata: The Disease Prevention Project has two objectives: 1) prevent and control vaccine-preventable diseases to reduce morbidity, disability and mortality, especially in the poorest provinces of China. This will be carried out by improving the immunization services and by introducing policy measures to improve vaccine quality and to ensure access of all population groups, and to add new vaccines to the Expanded Program on Immunization (EPI); and 2) improve the capacity of the health sector to design and implement health promotion programs to prevent and control the rising prevalence of non-communicable diseases (NCDs), sexually transmitted diseases (STDs)/human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) and injury. This will be accomplished through policy and institutional improvements and by implementing pilot programs, including surveillance, staff training, health education and other health promotion interventions, at selected locations. The project comprises three main components: 1) immunization, which consists of four sub-components: (a) cold chain improvement; (b) health workers' training; (c) management and surveillance; and (d) information, education and communication; 2) health promotion, which will comprise the following sub-components: (a) institutional development and policy reform; (b) human resources development; (c) surveillance, especially behavioral risk factor surveillance; and (d) community-based interventions; and 3) the national-level programs.

P003589.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>疾病预防项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目具有两大目标：（1）预防和控制可通过疫苗预防的疾病，以降低发病率、残疾率和死亡率，中国最贫困省份是防控重点。为开展防控，将改进免疫服务，采用政策措施提高疫苗质量，确保所有人群获得服务，向扩大国家免疫规划项目新增疫苗；（2）提高卫生行业设计和实施健康促进项目的能力，以便预防和控制非传染性疾病、性传播疾病、人体免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）和伤害等的日益流行。为此，将在部分地区开展政策制度改革，实施试点规划项目，包括监测、人员培训、健康教育和其它健康促进项目。本项目设有三个子项目：（1）免疫子项目，包括四个二级子项目：①冷链改造；②卫生工作者培训；③管理和监测；④信息、教育和宣传；（2）健康促进子项目，包括四个二级子项目：①制度建设和政策改革；②人力资源开发；③监测，尤其是行为风险因素监测；④社区干预措施；（3）国家规划子项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
